page.title: 20Clubs and Associations
page.content:
Clubs are well attended in Dawlish. Royal Air Force Association, British Legion, three political clubs, Air Training Corps, Boy Scouts, Girl Guides, Cubs and Brownies. There are various clubs to help invalids. e.g.the Arthritic Care Club. There are also senior citizens clubs. On the sporting side there is soccer, cricket, badminton, tennis, keep fit, swimming and several darts clubs. Several charitable clubs are run in this area.
The Dawlish Women's Institute.
Miss Rosemary Gorley Miss Eila Gorley
Mrs Jean Burgess.
